required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2b Study of Efficacy and Safety of ASLAN004 in Adults With Moderate-to-Severe Atopic Dermatitis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter, Dose-Ranging Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ASLAN004 in Adult Patients With Moderate-to-Severe Atopic Dermatitis

brief_summary.textblock: Phase 2b study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ASLAN004 in adult patients with moderate-to-severe Atopic Dermatitis (AD) who are candidates for systemic therapy. This study will have 5 treatment arms (4 active and 1 placebo).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from Baseline in Eczema Area and Severity Index (EASI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients achieving validated Investigator's Global Assessment (vIGA) response of 0 or 1 [5 point scale]
Proportion of patients with EASI 50, 75 and 90
Percent Change in EASI score from Baseline over time
Absolute and percent change in Pruritus Numerical Rating Scale (P-NRS) over time
Proportion of patients achieving a 4-point reduction in P-NRS
Change in Body Surface Area (BSA) affected with AD
Change in Patient Reported Outcomes (PROs) over time
Absolute and percent change in sleep NRS over time
Number of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Event and Treatment-Emergent Serious Adverse Event

arm_group.description: Placebo q2w - placebo injections at Baseline and Week 1, then every 2 weeks (q2w) to Week 14.
ASLAN004 300 mg q2w - loading doses at Baseline and Week 1, followed by regular doses of 300mg (q2w) to Week 14.
ASLAN004 400 mg q2w - loading doses at Baseline and Week 1, followed by regular doses of 400mg (q2w) to Week 14.
ASLAN004 400 mg q4w - loading doses at Baseline, Week 1 and Week 2, followed by regular doses of 400 mg or alternating placebo (q2W) to Week 14.
ASLAN004 600 mg q4w - loading doses at Baseline, Week 1 and Week 2, followed by regular doses of 600 mg or alternating placebo (q2W) to Week 14.
